name: I wanna be her
description:
Someone ends up in the bottom of a dry well; in there they can hear a voice making them a offer. “I let you out, you give me your ▊▋█▌▍▊▋█▌▍”

Maybe after enough time paying whatever wouldn’t sound to bad.

And maybe comming back can tell you something.

A little horror? experience about looking at walls and talking to mysterious voices with loops and no clear ending.

Duration:

  • Less than 15min (I think).
Warnings :

-soft-

  • Weird noises
  • Implied blood
  • Spooks?
  • Death?
